articles.title: Government expands security operations in northern counties
articles.description: Government expands security operations in northern counties. Security Operations Expansion continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: Government expands security operations in northern counties. The Security Operations Expansion has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the security sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
